title: WeltPixel Size Chart
content:
Size Guide

Not sure what size to get? Let us help you find the perfect fit. We think you’ll find this guide helpful, but if you still have questions send us an email at support@mystore.com or call us at 1-800-123-1234. Your comfort is our promise.
Not sure what size to get? We think you’ll find this guide helpful, but if you still have questions send us an email at support@mystore.com or call us at 1-123-123-1234.

12-14		 39-42 33-35 42-44
XL
16-18		 43-45 36-38 44-46
XXL
18-20		 46-48 39-41 47-49
How to Measure

Chest: Measure around the fullest part of chest, keeping the measuring tape up under arms and around shoulder blades.

Waist: Measure around waist (not over pants) at the natural waistline.

Hip: Measure around the fullest part of hips while standing straight with heels together.

*Size chart is a general guide. It may include sizes that are unavailable for this item. All measurements are in inches unless otherwise noted.

How to Measure

Chest: Measure around the fullest part of chest, keeping the measuring tape up under arms and around shoulder blades.

Waist: Measure around waist (not over pants) at the natural waistline.

Neck: Measure around the neck allowing the measuring tape to lay on the neck base comfortably.

*Size chart is a general guide. It may include sizes that are unavailable for this item. All measurements are in inches unless otherwise noted.

How to Measure

Chest: Measure around the fullest part of chest, keeping the measuring tape up under arms and around shoulder blades.

Waist: Measure around waist (not over pants) at the natural waistline.

Hip: Measure around the fullest part of hips while standing straight with heels together.

Height: Measure from the top of the head and pull the tape straight down to the floor. Stand straight with both feet together (bare feet only).

*Size chart is a general guide. It may include sizes that are unavailable for this item. All measurements are in inches unless otherwise noted.

M

How to Measure

Length: Measure your pet from the base of its neck to the base of its tail. Bump up a size if your pet has a thick coat, broad chest, or broad underside.

*Size chart is a general guide. It may include sizes that are unavailable for this item. All measurements are in inches unless otherwise noted.
